mapper.sql: id as id , classifyId as classifyId , teacherId as teacherId , subjectId as subjectId , managerId as managerId , teacher as teacher , title as title , content as content , frontCover as frontCover , subcontent as subcontent , hit as hit , years as years , beikaochongci_type as beikaochongciType , courseSort as courseSort , frontcover1 as frontcover1 , isAccept as isAccept , createDate as createDate , status as status , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , areaId as areaId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_video_course ( classifyId, teacherId, subjectId, managerId, teacher, title, content, frontCover, subcontent, hit, years, beikaochongci_type, courseSort, frontcover1, isAccept, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, areaId ) VALUES ( #{classifyId}, #{teacherId}, #{subjectId}, #{managerId}, #{teacher}, #{title}, #{content}, #{frontCover}, #{subcontent}, #{hit}, #{years}, #{beikaochongciType}, #{courseSort}, #{frontcover1}, #{isAccept}, #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{areaId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_video_course
classifyId = #{classifyId},
teacherId = #{teacherId},
subjectId = #{subjectId},
managerId = #{managerId},
teacher = #{teacher},
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
frontCover = #{frontCover},
subcontent = #{subcontent},
hit = #{hit},
years = #{years},
beikaochongci_type = #{beikaochongciType},
courseSort = #{courseSort},
frontcover1 = #{frontcover1},
isAccept = #{isAccept},
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
areaId = #{areaId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_video_course
classifyId = #{map.classifyId},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_video_course ( classifyId, teacherId, subjectId, managerId, teacher, title, content, frontCover, subcontent, hit, years, beikaochongci_type, courseSort, frontcover1, isAccept, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, areaId ) VALUES ( #{map.classifyId}, #{map.teacherId}, #{map.subjectId}, #{map.managerId}, #{map.teacher}, #{map.title}, #{map.content}, #{map.frontCover}, #{map.subcontent}, #{map.hit}, #{map.years}, #{map.beikaochongciType}, #{map.courseSort}, #{map.frontcover1}, #{map.isAccept}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.areaId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_video_course
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND classifyId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.classifyId} , '%')
AND teacherId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.teacherId} , '%')
AND subjectId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subjectId} , '%')
AND managerId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.managerId} , '%')
AND teacher like CONCAT('%', #{condition.teacher} , '%')
AND title like CONCAT('%', #{condition.title} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{condition.content} , '%')
AND frontCover like CONCAT('%', #{condition.frontCover} , '%')
AND subcontent like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subcontent} , '%')
AND hit like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hit} , '%')
AND years like CONCAT('%', #{condition.years} , '%')
AND beikaochongci_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.beikaochongciType} , '%')
AND courseSort like CONCAT('%', #{condition.courseSort} , '%')
AND frontcover1 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.frontcover1} , '%')
AND isAccept like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isAccept} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
